channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- PAM360
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- PAM360

item.title: CVE-2024-27312|2024-10-07T11:45:01.627Z -- manageengine -- pam360
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine PAM360 version 6601 is vulnerable to authorization vulnerability which allows a low-privileged user to perform admin actions. Note: This vulnerability affects only the PAM360 6600 version. No other versions are applicable to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-27313|2024-06-07T08:33:56.748Z -- manageengine -- pam360
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine PAM360 is vulnerable to Stored XSS vulnerability. This vulnerability is applicable only in the version 6610.
